page.title: 02BUILDINGS, STRETTON-ON-DUN.
page.content: IN STRETTON ON DUNSMORE THERE ARE A LOT OF LARGE AND IMPORTANT BUILDINGS. OUR{CHURCH}WHICH IS CALLED{ALL SAINTS IS ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT BUILDINGS. IT IS VERY LARGE AND IS ABOUT ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY YEARS OLD. IN THE CHURCH A SUNDAY SCHOOL IS HELD. THERE IS AT LEAST ONE SERVICE HELD EVERY WEEK. THERE IS A CHOIR OF ABOUT TWELVE PEOPLE WHO SING AT MOST SERVICES. THERE IS A CHURCH PARADE ON THE SECOND SUNDAY OF EVERY MONTH WHICH IS ATTENDED BY THE CHURCH YOUTH GROUPS. MOST SERVICES ARE TAKEN BY THE REV.G. BROUGH. WE ALSO HAVE A{VILLAGE {HALL }IN WHICH CUBS, BROWNIES, SCOUTS, GUIDES, OVER SIXTIES AND WOMENS INSTITUTE HOLD THEIR MEETINGS.
